item.title:
A new documentary about Lyle and Erik Menendez is in the works at Netflix.
It will feature exclusive interviews with the brothers.
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title:
The next season of Ryan Murphy’s Netflix anthology series ‘Monster’ will be about Lyle and Erik Menendez.
It will be titled ‘Monsters: The Lyle and Erik Menendez Story.’
item.author: FilmUpdates

item.title: The very last episode of #Succession is titled “With Open Eyes” and has a runtime of 1 hour and 30 minutes.
